mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subscriptions ( user_id, order_id, subscription_type, start_date, end_date, status ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{orderId}, #{subscriptionType}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{status} )
mapper.select: SELECT subscription_id, user_id, order_id, subscription_type, start_date, end_date, status FROM subscriptions WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = 'ACTIVE' AND end_date > NOW() ORDER BY end_date DESC
SELECT subscription_id, user_id, order_id, subscription_type, start_date, end_date, status FROM subscriptions WHERE order_id = #{orderId}

SELECT subscription_id, user_id, order_id, subscription_type, start_date, end_date, status FROM subscriptions WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND subscription_type = #{subscriptionType} AND status = 'ACTIVE' AND end_date > NOW() ORDER BY end_date DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE subscriptions SET status = 'EXPIRED' WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = 'ACTIVE' AND end_date <= NOW()
